overview:
Margo Epstein is a seasoned marketing and sales professional with proficiency in mobile & internet media, data base marketing, audience segmentation, CRM, emerging technologies, product launch and new business development.

She has expanded that foundation to start up organizations and other business verticals, introducing emerging technologies directed toward user friendly consumer applications.

Margo has spent 12 years in sales leadership roles in both established and new business environments, and is devoted to marketing ROI and consumer activation.
